NetworkDeviceFunction.description: The NetworkDeviceFunction schema represents a logical interface that a network adapter exposes.
NetworkDeviceFunction.longDescription: This resource shall represent a logical interface that a network adapter exposes in a Redfish implementation.

title: #NetworkDeviceFunction.NetworkDeviceFunction
